person.persName: John S. Malone (Hopkins County, Ky, wagonmaker, wheelwright and QMS 17th Ky Cav)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, wagon maker, wheelwright, and soldier (U.S.A.). Virginia native. Son of Edmund P. Malone and Celena A. Malone. Married to Nannie C. Johnson Malone in Christian County, Kentucky, on March 2, 1852. Father of George Malone, Walter Malone, Sarah R. Malone, Henry Malone, Edward Malone, and Nannie Malone. Wagon maker in Trigg County in 1850. Wheelwright in Hopkins County in 1860. Wagon maker in Hopkins County in 1863. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as quartermaster sergeant from January 3, 1865, to September 20, 1865.
